casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

Mat, 1952.

(May 7, 1952.) The People of the State of New York, Respondent, v. Peter A. Cocco, Appellant.

*1130All concur. (Appeal from a judgment convicting defendant of the crime of grand larceny, second degree. The order denies a motion for a new trial.) Present — Taylor, P. J., MeCum, Vaughan, Kimball and Piper, JJ.
